00080 TLightKit::TLightKit()
00081 {
00082         SO_KIT_CONSTRUCTOR(TLightKit);
00083 
00084         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_ABSTRACT_ENTRY(iconMaterial, SoNode, SoMaterial, TRUE, iconSeparator, icon, TRUE);
00085         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_ABSTRACT_ENTRY(iconTexture, SoNode, SoTexture2, TRUE, iconSeparator, iconMaterial, TRUE);
00086         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_ABSTRACT_ENTRY(tsunshape, TSunShape, TDefaultSunShape, TRUE, transformGroup, "", TRUE);
00087 
00088         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( azimuth, (0.0) );
00089         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( zenith, (0.0) );
00090 
00091 
00092         SO_KIT_INIT_INSTANCE();
00093 
00094         SoDirectionalLight* light = static_cast<SoDirectionalLight*>( getPart( "light", true ) );
00095         light->direction.setValue( SbVec3f( 0, -1, 0 ) );
00096 
00097         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
00098         setPart( "transform", transform );
00099 
00100         SoMaterial* lightMaterial = static_cast<SoMaterial*>( getPart( "iconMaterial", true ) );
00101         lightMaterial->transparency = 0.5;
00102         setPart( "iconMaterial", lightMaterial );
00103 
00104         int widthPixeles = 100;
00105         int heightPixeles = 100;
00106         //unsigned char bitmap[ widthPixeles * heightPixeles ];
00107         unsigned char*  bitmap = new unsigned char[ widthPixeles * heightPixeles ];
00108         for( int y = 0; y < heightPixeles; y++ )
00109         {
00110                 for( int x = 0; x < widthPixeles; x++ )
00111                 {
00112                         bitmap[ y* widthPixeles +x] = 255;
00113                 }
00114 
00115         }
00116 
00117         SoTexture2 * texture = new SoTexture2;
00118     texture->image.setValue( SbVec2s( heightPixeles, widthPixeles ), 1, bitmap );
00119         delete bitmap;
00120     texture->model = SoTexture2::BLEND;
00121     texture->blendColor.setValue( 0.933f, 0.91f, 0.666f );
00122         setPart( "iconTexture", texture );
00123 
00124         TLightShape* iconShape = new TLightShape;
00125         setPart( "icon", iconShape );
00126 }

00152 void TLightKit::Update( BBox box )
00153 {
00154 
00155         /*double xWidth = SbMax(-box.pMin.x,box.pMax.x) - SbMin(box.pMin.x,-box.pMax.x);
00156         double zWidth = SbMax(-box.pMin.z,box.pMax.z) - SbMin(box.pMin.z,-box.pMax.z);
00157         double xMax = sqrt(xWidth*xWidth + zWidth*zWidth)/2.0;
00158         double xMin = -xMax;
00159         double zMin = xMin;
00160         double zMax = xMax;
00161         if (-box.pMin.y>0) zMax = sqrt(box.pMin.y*box.pMin.y + xMax*xMax);
00162         if (-box.pMax.y<0) zMin = -sqrt(box.pMax.y*box.pMax.y + xMin*xMin);
00163         */
00164 
00165         double xMax = box.pMax.x;
00166         double xMin = box.pMin.x;
00167         double zMin = box.pMin.z;
00168         double zMax = box.pMax.z;
00169 
00170 
00171         double distMax = box.pMax.y + 10 - box.pMin.y;
00172         double back = box.pMax.y +10;
00173 
00174 
00175         if( -tgc::Infinity  == box.Volume() )
00176         {
00177                 xMin = 0.0;
00178                 xMax = 0.0;
00179                 zMin = 0.0;
00180                 zMax = 0.0;
00181                 distMax = 0.0;
00182         }
00183 
00184         TSunShape* sunshape = static_cast< TSunShape* >( this->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
00185         if( !sunshape ) return;
00186         double thetaMax = sunshape->GetThetaMax();
00187         double delta = 0.01;
00188         if(  thetaMax > 0.0 ) delta =distMax * tan( thetaMax );
00189 
00190         TLightShape* shape = static_cast< TLightShape* >( this->getPart( "icon", false ) );
00191         if( !shape )    return;
00192         shape->xMin.setValue( ( xMin - delta ) );
00193         shape->xMax.setValue( ( xMax + delta ) );
00194         shape->zMin.setValue( ( zMin - delta ) );
00195         shape->zMax.setValue( ( zMax + delta ) );
00196         shape->delta.setValue( delta );
00197 
00198 
00199         SoTransform* lightTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( this->getPart( "transform", false ) );
00200         if(!lightTransform) return;
00201         SbVec3f translation( 0.0, back, 0.0 );
00202         lightTransform->translation.setValue(translation );
00203 
00204 }
00205 
00206 void TLightKit::ComputeLightSourceArea(int widthDivisions,int heigthDivisions, QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > > surfacesList )
00207 {
00208         TLightShape* shape = static_cast< TLightShape* >( this->getPart( "icon", false ) );
00209         if( !shape )    return;
00210 
00211         double width =  shape->xMax.getValue() - shape->xMin.getValue();
00212         double height = shape->zMax.getValue() - shape->zMin.getValue();
00213 
00214 
00215         //int pixels = divisions;
00216         int widthPixeles = widthDivisions;
00217         while( ( width / widthPixeles ) < shape->delta.getValue() )     widthPixeles--;
00218         //if( ( width / pixels ) < shape->delta.getValue() ) widthPixeles = ceil( width / shape->delta.getValue() );
00219         double pixelWidth = double( width / widthPixeles );
00220 
00221         int heightPixeles = heigthDivisions;
00222         while( ( height / heightPixeles ) < shape->delta.getValue() )   heightPixeles--;
00223         //if( ( height / pixels ) < shape->delta.getValue() ) heightPixeles = ceil( height / shape->delta.getValue() );
00224         double pixelHeight = height / heightPixeles;
00225 
00226         QImage  sourceImage( widthPixeles, heightPixeles, QImage::Format_RGB32 );
00227         sourceImage.setOffset( QPoint( 0.5, 0.5 ) );
00228         sourceImage.fill( Qt::white  );
00229 
00230         QPainter painter( &sourceImage );
00231 
00232         QBrush brush( Qt::black );
00233         painter.setBrush( brush );
00234 
00235         QPen pen( Qt::black, Qt::NoPen );
00236         painter.setPen( pen );
00237 
00238         for( int s = 0; s < surfacesList.size(); s++ )
00239         {
00240                 TShapeKit* surfaceKit = surfacesList[s].first;
00241                 Transform surfaceTransform = surfacesList[s].second;
00242                 Transform shapeToWorld = surfaceTransform.GetInverse();
00243 
00244                 TShape* shapeNode = static_cast< TShape* > ( surfaceKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
00245                 if( shapeNode )
00246                 {
00247                         BBox shapeBB = shapeNode->GetBBox();
00248 
00249                         Point3D p1( shapeBB.pMin.x, shapeBB.pMin.y, shapeBB.pMin.z );
00250                         Point3D p2( shapeBB.pMax.x, shapeBB.pMin.y, shapeBB.pMin.z );
00251                         Point3D p3( shapeBB.pMax.x, shapeBB.pMin.y, shapeBB.pMax.z );
00252                         Point3D p4( shapeBB.pMin.x, shapeBB.pMin.y, shapeBB.pMax.z );
00253                         Point3D p5( shapeBB.pMin.x, shapeBB.pMax.y, shapeBB.pMin.z );
00254                         Point3D p6( shapeBB.pMax.x, shapeBB.pMax.y, shapeBB.pMin.z );
00255                         Point3D p7( shapeBB.pMax.x, shapeBB.pMax.y, shapeBB.pMax.z );
00256                         Point3D p8( shapeBB.pMin.x, shapeBB.pMax.y, shapeBB.pMax.z );
00257 
00258 
00259                         Point3D tP1 = shapeToWorld( p1 );
00260                         Point3D tP2 = shapeToWorld( p2 );
00261                         Point3D tP3 = shapeToWorld( p3 );
00262                         Point3D tP4 = shapeToWorld( p4 );
00263                         Point3D tP5 = shapeToWorld( p5 );
00264                         Point3D tP6 = shapeToWorld( p6 );
00265                         Point3D tP7 = shapeToWorld( p7 );
00266                         Point3D tP8 = shapeToWorld( p8 );
00267 
00268                         QPointF qP1( ( tP1.x - shape->xMin.getValue() ) /pixelWidth, ( tP1.z - shape->zMin.getValue() ) /pixelHeight );
00269                         QPointF qP2( ( tP2.x - shape->xMin.getValue() ) /pixelWidth, ( tP2.z - shape->zMin.getValue() ) /pixelHeight );
00270                         QPointF qP3( ( tP3.x - shape->xMin.getValue() ) /pixelWidth, ( tP3.z - shape->zMin.getValue() ) /pixelHeight );
00271                         QPointF qP4( ( tP4.x - shape->xMin.getValue() ) /pixelWidth, ( tP4.z - shape->zMin.getValue() ) /pixelHeight );
00272                         QPointF qP5( ( tP5.x - shape->xMin.getValue() ) /pixelWidth, ( tP5.z - shape->zMin.getValue() ) /pixelHeight );
00273                         QPointF qP6( ( tP6.x - shape->xMin.getValue() ) /pixelWidth, ( tP6.z - shape->zMin.getValue() ) /pixelHeight );
00274                         QPointF qP7( ( tP7.x - shape->xMin.getValue() ) /pixelWidth, ( tP7.z - shape->zMin.getValue() ) /pixelHeight );
00275                         QPointF qP8( ( tP8.x - shape->xMin.getValue() ) /pixelWidth, ( tP8.z - shape->zMin.getValue() ) /pixelHeight );
00276 
00277                         QPointF polygon1[4] = { qP1, qP2, qP3, qP4 };
00278                         QPointF polygon2[4] = { qP1, qP2, qP6, qP5 };
00279                         QPointF polygon3[4] = { qP1, qP4, qP8, qP5 };
00280                         QPointF polygon4[4] = { qP2, qP3, qP7, qP6 };
00281                         QPointF polygon5[4] = { qP3, qP4, qP8, qP7 };
00282                         QPointF polygon6[4] = { qP5, qP6, qP7, qP8 };
00283                         painter.drawPolygon( polygon1, 4 );
00284                         painter.drawPolygon( polygon2, 4 );
00285                         painter.drawPolygon( polygon3, 4 );
00286                         painter.drawPolygon( polygon4, 4 );
00287                         painter.drawPolygon( polygon5, 4 );
00288                         painter.drawPolygon( polygon6, 4 );
00289                 }
00290 
00291         }
00292 
00293         int** areaMatrix = new int*[heightPixeles];
00294         for( int i = 0; i < heightPixeles; i++ )
00295         {
00296                 areaMatrix[i] = new int[widthPixeles];
00297         }
00298 
00299         //unsigned char bitmap[ widthPixeles * heightPixeles ];
00300         unsigned char* bitmap = new unsigned char[ widthPixeles * heightPixeles ];
00301 
00302         QRgb black = qRgb( 0, 0, 0);
00303 
00304         for( int i = 0; i < widthPixeles; i++ )
00305         {
00306                 for( int j = 0; j < heightPixeles; j++ )
00307                 {
00308                         double pixelIntensity = ( sourceImage.pixel( i, j ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00309                         if( ( i - 1 ) >= 0 && ( j - 1 ) >= 0 ) pixelIntensity += ( sourceImage.pixel( i - 1, j - 1 ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00310                         if( ( j - 1 ) >= 0 ) pixelIntensity += ( sourceImage.pixel( i, j - 1 ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00311                         if( ( i + 1 ) < widthPixeles && ( j - 1) >= 0 )  pixelIntensity += ( sourceImage.pixel( i + 1, j - 1 ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00312                         if( ( i - 1 ) >= 0 )    pixelIntensity += ( sourceImage.pixel( i - 1, j ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00313                         if( ( i + 1 ) < widthPixeles )  pixelIntensity += ( sourceImage.pixel( i + 1, j ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00314                         if( ( i - 1 ) >= 0 && ( j + 1 ) < heightPixeles ) pixelIntensity += ( sourceImage.pixel( i - 1, j + 1 ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00315                         if( ( j + 1 ) < heightPixeles ) pixelIntensity += ( sourceImage.pixel( i, j + 1 ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00316                         if( ( i + 1 ) < widthPixeles && ( j + 1 ) < heightPixeles ) pixelIntensity += ( sourceImage.pixel( i + 1, j + 1 ) == black ) ? 1: 0;
00317 
00318                         if( pixelIntensity > 0.0 )
00319                         {
00320                                 areaMatrix[j][i] = 1;
00321                                 bitmap[ i * heightPixeles +  j ] = 0;
00322                         }
00323                         else
00324                         {
00325                                 areaMatrix[j][i] = 0;
00326                                 bitmap[ i * heightPixeles +  j ] = 255;
00327                         }
00328 
00329                 }
00330         }
00331 
00332         SoTexture2* texture = static_cast< SoTexture2* >( getPart( "iconTexture", true ) );
00333     texture->image.setValue( SbVec2s(  heightPixeles, widthPixeles ), 1, bitmap );
00334         delete bitmap;
00335     texture->wrapS = SoTexture2::COIN_1_0;
00336     texture->wrapT = SoTexture2::COIN_1_0;
00337 
00338     shape->SetLightSourceArea( heightPixeles, widthPixeles, areaMatrix );
00339 
00340 }
